paper_abstract: In this paper, a general approach is presented to compute the Homily polynomials of even polyhedral links formed from a polyhedron by 'n-branched curve and 2k-twisted double-line covering'. We show that Homily polynomials of the whole family of even polyhedral links can be obtained from the Tutte polynomial of the 1-skeleton of the polyhedron by special parametrizations. As applications, by using computer algebra (Maple) techniques, Homily polynomials of even Platonic polyhedral links are calculated.
paper_title: The Homfly Polynomial for Even Polyhedral Links
